title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Convenient where Share of respondents is 67.2.
The lowest category is found at Other where Share of respondents is 5.6.
The highest value at Convenient is almost 12.0 times larger than the minimum value of Other.
The highest value at Convenient is almost 12.0 times larger than the minimum value of Other.
The difference between the max Response Convenient and min Response Other is 61.6.
